items.description: Arrow facing up down left right
items.name: arrow-up-down-left-right

targets.query:
from(bucket: "thechantry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network"] == "thechantry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vargroup"] == "dat") 
  |> last()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network"] == "thechantry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vargroup"] == "dat") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
